<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3 </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.62</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Vehicle in Vehicle Transport </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Despite a misleading name, returns the vehicle that is transporting given vehicle in cargo. If the given vehicle is not in vehicle cargo, [[objNull]] is returned.  </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''isVehicleCargo''' cargo </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> cargo: [[Object]] - vehicle in cargo  </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Object]] - transporting vehicle </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> Blackfish with given variable name blackfish, with a vehicle inside called quad
<code>_transportingVehicle = [[isVehicleCargo]] quad; //returns blackfish</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> Vehicle called quad that is not being transported as cargo
<code>_transportingVehicle = [[isVehicleCargo]] quad; //returns [[objNull]]
</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE2</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[Arma_3_Vehicle_in_Vehicle_Transport| Vehicle in Vehicle Transport ]] [[canVehicleCargo]] [[setVehicleCargo]] [[enableVehicleCargo]] [[getVehicleCargo]] [[vehicleCargoEnabled]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>

</value></part></template>
